name: Pong Remastered
description:
Pong Remastered is a creative twist on the beloved 70s arcade game. Our development team has retained the simplicity and minimalism that made the original so great, while including exciting new features. 


Game now available for free on the Google Play Store.

Balls now come in three colors: 

> White Ball: the standard, garden-variety, vanilla ball. Grants +3 to the player if successfully shot behind the enemy player.

> Green Ball: green is good. Grants +1 to the player if let into his/her 'Dead Zone'.

> Red Ball: hands off these guys. Deducts 1 point from the player who touches a Red Ball. Despawns after contact or after 6 bounces .

In addition, there are currently three gamemodes:

> STANDARD: gain 50 points against the Computer;

> SURVIVAL: try to hold out against increasingly larger hordes of Balls. Watch out though. If the enemy gets more than a 20-point lead on you, it's Game Over. 

> SUDDEN DEATH: survive against a devastatingly fast Computer. In addition, the longer you stay alive, the faster the ball becomes. As soon as you let the ball in, it's Game Over!

More features will be implemented in future updates. Let us know if you encounter any bugs or would like to suggest a new feature. We are more than happy to take on any constructive advice. Thanks for playing!

- Fagerstrom 'n' Strong Dev Team
